rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Yi was great! Her lectures are enjoyable, you will need the textbook to complete the weekly quizzes. Be ready to complete a few case study assignments but they are not hard to complete.
She is a great professor and is passionate about the hospitality industry!! She truly cares about each student and wants them to succeed. No tests only quizzes which are open book.

Esther teaches her course like every other professor should teach theirs. She doesn't make it difficult but she makes you work for your grade, you can not just breeze through this class! The Restaurant Concept Proposal Project challenged me in ways that have helped me grow as a leader and discover my passion in the hospitality industry!

She was AMAZING!! I love her teaching style and her attitude. She's a huge ball of positive energy and fun and she takes the time to actually explain the content of the chapters, to make sure you fully understand everything. Assignments every week, but they're not difficult. Come to class to pass, but she makes class soooo interactive and fun!

Esther is such a wonderful professor and her Restaurant Management class was the most engaging and interactive class I've had my entire college career! She is so full of passion and beyond knowledgeable in her subject. She has significantly helped me find my true passion in Hospitality and I couldn't thank her more for that! Best professor ever!

She is new to teaching and full of passion for what she does. Whether you are a hospitality major or not, I highly recommend taking her course. She works so hard to secure as many opportunities as she can for her students and wants you to succeed. Take her, she cares about you as an individual and wants you to succeed - she will help in any way.

She is young and understands us, students, more than most professors do. She understands that we have a life outside of school and outside of just her class. No tests. Quizzes over book chapters are very easy. Case study assignments are very straightforward. Same for article reviews. Very easy class and she cares about all of us. Super cool events!
